com.ibm.wcs.annotationservice

Class AnnotationServiceConstants

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.ibm.wcs.annotationservice.AnnotationServiceConstants

  • public class AnnotationServiceConstants
extends Object
    Various constants used by the Annotation Service.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static String ACCEPTED_CONTENT_TYPES_FIELD_NAME
      Name of the field in the Annotator Bundle Configuration JSON record that indicates the types of input text accepted by this annotator, e.g., "text/plain", or "text/html", or "text/plain, text/html" for both
      static String ANNOTATION_TYPE_FIELD_NAME
      Name of the field in the output JSON Record indicating the name of an output annotation type.
      static String ANNOTATIONS_FIELD_NAME
      Name of the field in the output JSON Record indicating annotations output for the document
      static String ANNOTATIONS_SIZE_FIELD_NAME
      Name of the field in the output JSON Record indicating the number of annotations extracted for a particular output type
      static String ANNOTATIONS_SIZE_PER_TYPE_FIELD_NAME
      Name of the field in the output JSON Record indicating the number of annotations extracted for each output type
      static String ANNOTATIONS_SIZE_TOTAL_FIELD_NAME
      Name of the field in the output JSON Record indicating the total number of annotations extracted for the input document
      static String ANNOTATOR_FIELD_NAME
      Name of the field in the Annotator Bundle Configuration JSON record that indicates the annotator info, including the key and version field; this is also the name under which the annotator info is serialized inside each output annotation, if the AnnotatorBundleConfig.serializeAnnotatorInfo is set to true.
      static String ANNOTATOR_KEY_FIELD_NAME
      Name of the field in the annotator field of the Annotator Bundle Configuration JSON record that indicates the annotator key
      static String ANNOTATOR_RUNTIME_FIELD_NAME
      Name of the field in the Annotator Bundle Configuration JSON record that indicates the text analytics runtime for executing this annotator, e.g., SystemT, UIMA, SIRE
      static String ANNOTATOR_VERSION_FIELD_NAME
      Name of the field in the annotator field of the Annotator Bundle Configuration JSON record that indicates the annotator version
      static String ATTRIBUTE_NAME_BEGIN
      This is a feature from the type 'uima.cas.Annotation', marking the beginning of the text to which the annotation is applied.
      static String ATTRIBUTE_NAME_END
      This is a feature from the type 'uima.cas.Annotation', marking the end of the text to which the annotation is applied.
      static String ATTRIBUTE_NAME_SPAN
      This is the default attribute used for serializing all the features subsuming the type 'uima.cas.Annotation'.
      static long DEFAULT_TIMEOUT
      Default timeout (in milliseconds) to use whenever no timeout is specified.
      static String DESCRIPTOR_ATTRIBUTE_LOCATION
      Attribute name expected in descriptor XML (location)
      static String DESCRIPTOR_TAG_ANALYSIS_ENGINE_METADATA
      Tag name expected in descriptor XML (analysisEngineMetaData)
      static String DESCRIPTOR_TAG_CAPABILITY
      Tag name expected in descriptor XML (capability)
      static String DESCRIPTOR_TAG_DELEGATE_ANALYSIS_ENGINE
      Tag name expected in descriptor XML (delegateAnalysisEngine)
      static String DESCRIPTOR_TAG_IMPORT
      Tag name expected in descriptor XML (import)
      static String DESCRIPTOR_TAG_INPUT_SOFAS
      Tag name expected in descriptor XML (inputSofas)
      static String DESCRIPTOR_TAG_NAME
      Tag name expected in descriptor XML (name)
      static String DESCRIPTOR_TAG_SOFA_NAME
      Tag name expected in descriptor XML (sofaName)
      static String DESCRIPTOR_TAG_SUPER_TYPE_NAME
      Tag name expected in descriptor XML (supertypeName)
      static String DESCRIPTOR_TAG_TYPE_DESCRIPTION
      Tag name expected in descriptor XML (typeDescription)
      static String DOCUMENT_CONTENT_FIELD_NAME
      Name of the field in the input document JSON Record that is considered the first choice of default document content field (first choice) for all annotator runtimes, with DOCUMENT_TEXT_FIELD_NAME being used as the second choice as follows:

      UIMA annotator: if UIMA annotator use the default SOFA view _InitialView, pass it the value of content (if it exists in the input record); otherwise, pass the value of the text (second choice) if it exists in the input record; otherwise throw an exception SIRE annotator:pass the value of content (if it exists in the input record); otherwise, pass the value of the text (second choice) if it exists in the input record; otherwise throw an exception SystemT annotator: if the annotator expects the view Document to have the field called 'text', pass the value of content (if it exists in the input record) into Document.text; otherwise, pass the value of the text (second choice) if it exists in the input record.
      static String DOCUMENT_DEFAULT_CONTENT_TYPE
      Default content type to use when no language code is specified in the execution parameters for a given document
      static String DOCUMENT_DEFAULT_LANGUAGE_CODE
      Default language to use when no language code is specified in the execution parameters for a given document
      static String DOCUMENT_PARAMETER_NAME
      Name of the input document parameter
      static String DOCUMENT_SIZE_FIELD_NAME
      Name of the field in the output JSON Record indicating the size (in number of characters) of the input document; obtained by adding up the length in characters of all fields of the input document that are of type String, ignoring other fields of other type (e.g., integer, float, boolean)
      static String DOCUMENT_TEXT_FIELD_NAME
      Name of the field in the input document JSON Record that is considered the second choice to pass as document content field (after DOCUMENT_CONTENT_FIELD_NAME which is the first choice) for all annotator runtime; see DOCUMENT_CONTENT_FIELD_NAME for a full explanation
      static String EXCEPTION_MESSAGE_FIELD_NAME
      Name of the field in the output document JSON Record that stores the error message, if any error occurred
      static String EXCEPTION_STACKTRACE_FIELD_NAME
      Name of the field in the output document JSON Record that stores the error stack trace, if any error occurred
      static String EXTERNAL_DICTIONARIES_FIELD_NAME
      For SystemT annotators, name of the field in the Annotator Bundle Configuration JSON record that indicates the external dictionaries used by this annotator, as a JSON array of key value pairs, where the key is the AQL external dictionary name and the value is the location of the dictionary file, relative to the location field.
      static String EXTERNAL_TABLES_FIELD_NAME
      For SystemT annotators, name of the field in the Annotator Bundle Configuration JSON record that indicates the external tables used by this annotator, as a JSON array of key value pairs, where the key is the AQL external table name and the value is the location of the CSV file with the table entries, relative to the location field.
      static String ID_KEY 
      static String INPUT_TYPES_FIELD_NAME
      Name of the field in the Annotator Bundle Configuration JSON record that indicates the input types expected by this annotator
      static String INSTRUMENTATION_INFO_FIELD_NAME
      Name of the field in the output document JSON Record where the instrumentation info collected during runtime is stored
      static String INTERRUPTED_FIELD_NAME
      Name of the field in the output JSON Record indicating whether the annotator was interrupted
      static String LOCATION_FIELD_NAME
      Name of the field in the Annotator Bundle Configuration JSON record that indicates the location where the annotator bundle has been deployed
      static String MODULE_NAMES_FIELD_NAME
      For SystemT annotators, name of the field in the Annotator Bundle Configuration JSON record that indicates the names of modules to instantiate for this annotator as a JSON Array of Strings, where each string is a module name
      static String MODULE_PATH_FIELD_NAME
      For SystemT annotators, name of the field in the Annotator Bundle Configuration JSON record that indicates the module path for this annotator as a JSON array of String values, where each String is a HDFS URI
      static long NO_TIMEOUT
      Special value to use when invoking the annotation service with no timeout.
      static String ONTOLOGY_AWARE_FIELD_NAME
      Name of the field in the Annotator Bundle Configuration JSON record that indicates the serialization scheme.
      static String OUTPUT_TYPES_FIELD_NAME
      Name of the field in the Annotator Bundle Configuration JSON record that indicates the output types produced by this annotator
      static String RUNNING_TIME_FIELD_NAME
      Name of the fields in the output JSON Record indicating the number of milliseconds spent processing a given document
      static String SERIALIZE_ANNOTATOR_INFO_FIELD_NAME
      Name of the field in the Annotator Bundle Configuration JSON record that indicates whether annotator info, including the key and version field are serialized inside each output annotation
      static String SERIALIZE_SPAN_FIELD_NAME
      Name of the field in the Annotator Bundle Configuration JSON record that indicates the span format.
      static String SOURCE_MODULES_FIELD_NAME
      For SystemT annotators, name of the field in the Annotator Bundle Configuration JSON record that indicates the AQL module path for this annotator as a JSON array of String values, where each String is a HDFS URI
      static String SPAN_BEGIN_FIELD_NAME
      The name of the field in the JSON record representation of a span that indicates the begin offset of the span.
      static String SPAN_DOCREF_FIELD_NAME
      The name of the (optional) field in the JSON record representation of a span that indicates the name of the field in the input document record that the span is over.
      static String SPAN_END_FIELD_NAME
      The name of the field in the JSON record representation of a span that indicates the end offset of the span.
      static String SPAN_LOCATION_FIELD_NAME
      The name of the field in the JSON record representation of a span when serializeSpan:"locationAndText" is specified
      static String SPAN_TEXT_FIELD_NAME
      The name of the field in the JSON record representation of a text in location when serializeSpan:"locationAndText" is specified
      static String SUCCESS_FIELD_NAME
      Name of the field in the output JSON Record indicating whether the annotator completely successfully (i.e., there were no errors, and it was not interrupted).
      static String TOKENIZER_FIELD_NAME
      For SystemT annotators, name of the field in the Annotator Bundle Configuration JSON record that indicates the type of tokenizer used by the SystemT annotator, e.g., standard or multilingual
      static String TOKENIZER_PEAR_FILE_FIELD_NAME
      For SystemT annotators, the name of the field in the Annotator Bundle Configuration JSON record that indicates the location of the tokenizer pear file, relative to the location field.
      static String TYPE_NAME_ANNOTATION
      Name of the annotation type.
      static String UIMA_CLASS_PATH_FIELD_NAME
      For UIMA annotators, the name of the field in the Annotator Bundle Configuration JSON record that indicates the extended UIMA class path of this annotator, as a JSON Array of Strings, where each string represents one class path entry, relative to the location field.
      static String UIMA_DATA_PATH_FIELD_NAME
      For UIMA annotators, the name of the field in the Annotator Bundle Configuration JSON record that indicates the UIMA data path of this annotator, as a JSON Array of Strings, where each string represents the location of one entry in the data path, relative to the location field.
      static char UIMA_DATA_PATH_SEP_CHAR
      Uima data path separator character
      static String UIMA_DESCRIPTOR_FILE_FIELD_NAME
      For UIMA annotators, the name of the field in the Annotator Bundle Configuration JSON record that indicates the location of the UIMA descriptor XML file, relative to the location field.
      static String UIMA_PEAR_FILE_FIELD_NAME
      For UIMA annotators, the name of the field in the Annotator Bundle Configuration JSON record that indicates the location of the UIMA pear file, relative to the location field.
      static String VERSION_FIELD_NAME
      Name of the field in the Annotator Bundle Configuration JSON record that indicates the version of the configuration format, e.g., "1.0"

      • SPAN_DOCREF_FIELD_NAME

        public static final String SPAN_DOCREF_FIELD_NAME
        The name of the (optional) field in the JSON record representation of a span that indicates the name of the field in the input document record that the span is over. This field is not populated for spans that are over default document content fields DOCUMENT_CONTENT_FIELD_NAME and DOCUMENT_TEXT_FIELD_NAME.

        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • DOCUMENT_CONTENT_FIELD_NAME

        public static final String DOCUMENT_CONTENT_FIELD_NAME
        Name of the field in the input document JSON Record that is considered the first choice of default document content field (first choice) for all annotator runtimes, with DOCUMENT_TEXT_FIELD_NAME being used as the second choice as follows:

        • UIMA annotator: if UIMA annotator use the default SOFA view _InitialView, pass it the value of content (if it exists in the input record); otherwise, pass the value of the text (second choice) if it exists in the input record; otherwise throw an exception
        • SIRE annotator:pass the value of content (if it exists in the input record); otherwise, pass the value of the text (second choice) if it exists in the input record; otherwise throw an exception
        • SystemT annotator: if the annotator expects the view Document to have the field called 'text', pass the value of content (if it exists in the input record) into Document.text; otherwise, pass the value of the text (second choice) if it exists in the input record. Throw an exception if either none of the two fields are present in the input record, or both fields are present in the input record. SystemT annotators whose Document view contains both text and content fields are not supported.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • DOCUMENT_TEXT_FIELD_NAME

        public static final String DOCUMENT_TEXT_FIELD_NAME
        Name of the field in the input document JSON Record that is considered the second choice to pass as document content field (after DOCUMENT_CONTENT_FIELD_NAME which is the first choice) for all annotator runtime; see DOCUMENT_CONTENT_FIELD_NAME for a full explanation
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • DOCUMENT_DEFAULT_LANGUAGE_CODE

        public static final String DOCUMENT_DEFAULT_LANGUAGE_CODE
        Default language to use when no language code is specified in the execution parameters for a given document
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • DOCUMENT_DEFAULT_CONTENT_TYPE

        public static final String DOCUMENT_DEFAULT_CONTENT_TYPE
        Default content type to use when no language code is specified in the execution parameters for a given document

      • ATTRIBUTE_NAME_BEGIN

        public static final String ATTRIBUTE_NAME_BEGIN
        This is a feature from the type 'uima.cas.Annotation', marking the beginning of the text to which the annotation is applied.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • ATTRIBUTE_NAME_END

        public static final String ATTRIBUTE_NAME_END
        This is a feature from the type 'uima.cas.Annotation', marking the end of the text to which the annotation is applied.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • ATTRIBUTE_NAME_SPAN

        public static final String ATTRIBUTE_NAME_SPAN
        This is the default attribute used for serializing all the features subsuming the type 'uima.cas.Annotation'. This attribute wraps the features 'begin' and 'end' which are always present in each feature of the type 'uima.cas.Annotation'. It may also contain an optional feature called 'docref' which exists if the particular annotation comes from the non-default view of the input CAS. The value of 'docref' is the name of the non-default view, to which this annotation refers.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • ID_KEY

        public static final String ID_KEY
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • AnnotationServiceConstants
